name: Quarantine Zone (CollegeStudent)
description:
The story of my environment is that there was a virus outbreak that caused people to lose their minds. The virus changed them into a zombie like state attacking anyone on sight. The remaining healthy population managed to be evacuated to quarantine zones around the world. Heavily armed and in the middle of nowhere this site should be safe, right? 

Camp 43 was attacked during the early hours of the morning leaving no survivors. You are responding to a distress call from the site but you show up to find it is completely abandoned. At least, you think it is.

Short environment showcase for a college project. 

Headphone warning: Loud sounds. 18+: Gore, mature themes and graphic content.
